page.title: 05THE PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Established 1819 or earlier.In May 1985 29 children aged from 4+to 11.{ {Staff}Headmistress who teaches juniors an infant teacher and a part-time teacher,part-time secretary,a dinner server,a dinner supervisor,a part-time caretaker.There are 11 school governors.There is an association of teachers,parents and friends of the school.There are two rooms,a servery, (not a cooking kitchen.)Dinners are transported from Bradwell.There are 2 playgrounds.School has permission to use a farmer's field for activities. Sometimes animals are grazing on the field.66% of children are transported to school by minibus provided by the Education Authority.Children go to Buxton Pool for swimming lessons.(12 miles)School was last modernised in 1979.
